column2: How many distinct digits will be represented by all touchdown scorers' jersey numbers?
column6: For instance, if Kelce (87), Kittle (85), and McCaffrey (23) all score touchdowns, there are five distinct digits in "87 85 23".

column2: How many factors will the jersey number of the first touchdown scorer have?
column5: Pushable if no touchdowns are scored.

column2: What will be the sum of completed years of NFL experience of all touchdown scorers?
column6: A player adds their years of experience to this counter every time they score; the counter is assumed to start the game at 0.
column7: completed years of NFL experience,touchdown scorer

column2: What proportion of touchdowns will be scored by players whose listed colleges played football in the Pac-12, SEC, or ACC in 2023?
column6: Half of zero is zero, which means that "Half or more" wins if there are no touchdowns scored.

column2: Will the yardage of the longest made field goal or extra point exceed the yardage of the longest play from scrimmage?
column6: The made kick yardage counter is assumed to start the game at 0.

column2: Will we see the number "87" visible on Taylor Swift's clothing during the game?
Will we see Taylor Swift holding a drink during the game?
column6: Any beverage counts, even if it's water.

column2: Will Usher open his halftime performance with "DJ Got Us Fallin' in Love"?
column6: We'll expect there to be a link similar to https://www.setlist.fm/setlist/rihanna/2023/state-farm-stadium-glendale-az-33bd50d1.html.

column2: Will Ludacris perform with Usher during his halftime performance?
Will Usher spell out his full name during his halftime performance?
column6: He does this in "Nice & Slow".

column2: What will be higher: the number of field goals the Celtics attempt against Heat or the total points scored in the Super Bowl?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match.
column6: Picks for this prop must be made before 1pm ET on Sunday.

column2: During which set of quarters and overtimes will more points be scored?
column6: The first overtime will be considered "odd", the second "even", and so forth.

column2: How many performers besides Usher will be billed as having been in the halftime performance?
column6: Last year, it was just Rihanna; two years ago, there were five headliners and two special guests.

column2: Will "Yeah!" be one of the first three songs performed during the halftime performance?
column6: We'll expect there to be a link similar to https://www.setlist.fm/setlist/rihanna/2023/state-farm-stadium-glendale-az-33bd50d1.html.

column2: Will any BBGPBG proposer have at least two of their props go unselected by everyone?
What will be the combined yardage on all touchdown plays?
column6: If no touchdowns are scored, the combined yardage is assumed to be 0.

column2: What will be the total number of first downs made?
What will be the jersey number of the first touchdown scorer?
How many receiving yards will Kelce and Kittle combine for?
What will be higher: the combined number of sacks and turnovers in the Super Bowl or the goals scored in both Sunday EPL games?
column6: Picks for this prop must be made before 9am ET on Sunday.

column2: Will the Chiefs have more combined punts and field goal attempts than the 49ers?
Will more touchdowns be scored by players who were 1st or 2nd round draft picks than by all other players?
How many touchbacks will there be?
What will be the total attendance of the Super Bowl?
Will a Killers or Taylor Swift song be used as transition-to-commercial music before the second quarter begins during the game?

Will "Yeah!" be the final song of the halftime performance?
column6: We'll expect there to be a link similar to https://www.setlist.fm/setlist/rihanna/2023/state-farm-stadium-glendale-az-33bd50d1.html.

column2: Will Lil Jon appear in person during the halftime performance?
Will Justin Bieber perform during the halftime performance?
Will the winning team be ahead at the end of each quarter?
column6: If the score is ever tied at the end of a quarter, this prop resolves to "No".

column2: How many touchbacks will there be?
Will the seconds digit of the game clock be even or odd when the last touchdown is scored?
column5: Pushable if no touchdowns are scored.

column2: Will there be more combined points scored in the 1st and 4th quarters than the 2nd and 3rd?
Will Kelce and Pacheco have more combined receiving yards than McCaffrey and Kittle?
What will be the combined yardage on all touchdown plays?
column6: If no touchdowns are scored, the combined yardage is assumed to be 0.

column2: What will be the color of the liquid dumped on the winning head coach?
Will we see a live shot of a shirtless Jason Kelce during the broadcast window?
column6: A replay of Kelce shirtless at the Bills game a few weeks ago does not count.

column2: What will be Kelce's combined number of receptions and touchdowns?
How many yards from scrimmage will McCaffrey have?
How many passing yards will Mahomes have?
Which half's last touchdown play will end with less time remaining on the game clock?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match or if no touchdowns are scored.
column6: If a touchdown is only scored in one half, this prop resolves in favor of that half's side.

column2: Which half's last made field goal play will end with less time remaining on the game clock?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match or if no field goals are scored.
column6: If a field goal is only scored in one half, this prop resolves in favor of that half's side.

column2: Which half's last punt play will end with less time remaining on the game clock?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match or if there are no punts.
column6: If a punt is only executed in one half, this prop resolves in favor of that half's side.

column2: Which half's last turnover play will end with less time remaining on the game clock?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match or if there are no turnovers.
column6: If a turnover is only committed in one half, this prop resolves in favor of that half's side.

column2: Which half's last incomplete pass play will end with less time remaining on the game clock?
column5: Pushable if the values exactly match or if there are no incomplete passes.
column6: If an incomplete pass is only thrown in one half, this prop resolves in favor of that half's side.

column2: Will Bosa, Butker, Karlaftis, Kelce, Kittle, McCaffrey, Moody, or Purdy be named Super Bowl MVP?
column6: In the event that co-MVPs are named, "Yes" resolves as long as the specified players are not outnumbered by unspecified players.

column2: Will any player achieve an octopus?
Which trio of teammates will score more points?
column6: A tie goes to the players on the last team to score in the game.

column2: Will the last digit of the losing team's score be a prime number?
column6: The last digit of "0" is "0".

column2: How many fourth-down conversions will there be?
What will be the best line-score poker hand for either team?
What will be the sum of the digits that comprise the final score?
column6: For example, a game ending 21-17 results in a sum-of-digits of 2 + 1 + 1 + 7 = 11.

column2: How many timeouts will go unused?
Will the final play be a kneel-down?

Will either team's final score be a prime number or a Fibonacci number?
Will a timeout be called by or charged to either team before the game clock reads "5:00" in the second quarter?

Will the longest punt be at least 55 yards?
How many failed two-point conversion attempts will there be?
